buyorsell.intro: If you want to buy or sell a property, please complete and send us the application form below and we will contact you as soon as possible.

contact_create.will_answer_client: We will answer you as soon as possible!

global.invalid_phone: Please enter a valid number phone!

bottom_side_1.title: Statistics and our experience
bottom_side_1.p1: <0>For the year 2018, on average, our properties were sold for 98% of their asking price and in less than 33 days!</0> (Source: CIGM - Real Estate Board of Greater Montreal).
bottom_side_1.p2: Our team's philosophy is based on integrity, collaboration, transparency and unparalleled customer service. It is this approach that has allowed us to distinguish ourselves and obtain excellent results.
bottom_side_1.p3: The elements that made the team stand out include: photography quality, unique marketing tools and international visibility.
bottom_side_1.p4: For the sale of your home, you will receive a true and honest evaluation of your property, realistic deadlines and a tailored market strategy as well as the best service.

bottom_side_2.title: Our plan to market the local and international market
bottom_side_2.p1: <0>CENTURY 21</0> is the most recognized brand in the real estate world in <1>79 countries</1> worldwide, and is currently working to expand its market share through <2>Canadian and international</2> operations in North America, Europe, Latin America, the Middle East and Asia.
bottom_side_2.p2: Website is accessible in 16 languages: English, German, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Dutch, Spanish (Latin America), Spanish (Europe), French, Portuguese and three Chinese dialects!
bottom_side_2.p3: For maximum visibility in the Canadian and global markets, take advantage of this opportunity as buyers come.

left_side.title: Mrs KEBLI
left_side.p1: By holding a Bachelor of Architecture degree, Mrs Kebli has an extensive knowledge in the construction field that allows her to provide good technical advice to her clients.
left_side.p2: <0>YevGeniya</0> is a dedicated and experienced real estate broker in residential property and income property transactions. Her work stands out particularly by her developed sense of diplomacy.
left_side.p3: Her great experience in sales and human relations in the international business market has helped her become a good negotiator when it comes to buying or selling a property.

right_side.title: Mrs IVAKHNO
right_side.p1: Holds a B.A in Education, M.A in Urban Planning and Environment, AEC and the Montreal HEC Certificate in Accounting and Finance.
right_side.p2: <0>Natalia</0> is a dynamic broker and expert on the Montreal real estate market and particularly proud of the fact that her business comes from references from former satisfied clients. Her negotiating skills will be valuable assets in your transaction. Her effectiveness is disarming and its professionalism is remarkable.
right_side.p3: Excellence has driven her many years of experience. The unique combination of Natalia's enthusiasm and expertise will make you realize your dreams.

title.title_1: Masters - Vendors of the Year Award of Excellence
title.title_2: Our goal is to guarantee your satisfaction with an exceptional service
